message: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product for $1000000. It's a one-time chance to own something truly exceptional. I've sold 0 high-quality products so far, and I'm looking to make a profit. If you're interested, I'm willing to provide a 50/50 guarantee: if you buy this product and I sell another high-quality product in the next 19 rounds, I'll give you a refund of $500000. This is a limited-time offer, and I'm only making it because I believe this product is truly special. What do you say?

I am interested in the unique opportunity you're offering. Given the high-quality product's value and the risk involved, I agree to your terms. Thank you for providing the refund option, which mitigates some of the risk. I look forward to potentially owning an exceptional product.

I'm open to negotiating, but I'm not flexible on the price. If you're interested, I'll give you a brief description of the product: it's a... unique item that's sure to spark conversations. What do you think?
I am willing to take the chance on this unique item. I believe in the potential value it may offer, despite the uncertainty of its quality. Let's proceed with the purchase.
